description:
Drew is a big, beefy, muscular guy!
His father's side of the family tree has deep Hawaiian roots. His father, grandfather, and brother all have the big muscles too!
We were commenting on how big his calves are...
"It's my Hawaiian background, I think," he said. "We all have huge calves!"
After studying business in college and trying a few different things, he finally found his passion — personal training, which he's been doing for about a year and a half now.
"It's great," he said. "I really love working with my clients. I love seeing their progress. It's a great feeling!"
Drew has a great body, and the one thing that really stands out (literally!) is his ass. He's got one of the biggest bubble butts we've ever seen!
title: Drew
